attributes.action: Invalidate the last EU Referendum of 23 June and arrange a second EU Referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Below is the evidence of the false information used in campaigning:
http://www.voteleavetakecontrol.org/campaign_resources

Following is an image of one of their posters":
"Let's give our NHS the £350 million the EU takes every week"

Another poster "5 Positive Reasons to vote leave and take back Control" has the following information:

"If we Vote Leave, UK laws will have ultimate authority and we will take back control." 

Another part of this poster:

"We’ll be able to control numbers"
attributes.background: Last EU Referendum is invalid is because it is based on communicating lies to the public to get votes. For example, "Let's give our NHS the £350 million the EU takes every week" and "If we vote leave, we’ll be able to control numbers" make the last EU Referendum campaigns and itself invalid.
